verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הִנָּבֵ֛א <WH5012> prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> against נְבִיאֵ֥י <WH5030> against the prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel הַנִּבָּאִ֑ים <WH5012> that prophesy וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> and say לִנְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> thou unto them that prophesy מִלִּבָּ֔ם <WH3820> out of their own hearts שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> Hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> ye the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD ה֖וֹי <WH1945> Woe עַל־ <WH5921> and הַנְּבִיאִ֣ים <WH5030> prophets הַנְּבָלִ֑ים <WH5036> unto the foolish אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הֹלְכִ֛ים <WH1980> along אַחַ֥ר <WH310> after that רוּחָ֖ם <WH7307> their own spirit וּלְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> nothing רָאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> and have seen
כְּשֻׁעָלִ֖ים <WH7776> are like the foxes בָּחֳרָב֑וֹת <WH2723> in the deserts נְבִיאֶ֥יךָ <WH5030> thy prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> O Israel הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> have been

לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor עֲלִיתֶם֙ <WH5927> Ye have not gone up בַּפְּרָצ֔וֹת <WH6556> into the gaps וַתִּגְדְּר֥וּ <WH1443> neither made up גָדֵ֖ר <WH1447> the hedge עַל־ <WH5921> around בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> for the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> to stand בַּמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> in the battle בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

חָ֤זוּ <WH2372> They have seen שָׁוְא֙ <WH7723> vanity וְקֶ֣סֶם <WH7081> divination כָּזָ֔ב <WH3577> and lying הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <WH559> saying נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> has not שְׁלָחָ֑ם <WH7971> hath not sent וְיִֽחֲל֖וּ <WH3176> them and they have made [others] to hope לְקַיֵּ֥ם <WH6965> that they would confirm דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> the word

הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not מַֽחֲזֵה־ <WH4236> vision שָׁוְא֙ <WH7723> a vain חֲזִיתֶ֔ם <WH2372> Have ye not seen וּמִקְסַ֥ם <WH4738> divination כָּזָ֖ב <WH3577> a lying אֲמַרְתֶּ֑ם <WH1696> and have ye not spoken וְאֹֽמְרִים֙ <WH559> whereas ye say נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I לֹ֥א <WH3808> not דִבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1696> answer ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Because דַּבֶּרְכֶ֣ם <WH1696> Because ye have spoken שָׁ֔וְא <WH7723> vanity וַחֲזִיתֶ֖ם <WH2372> and seen כָּזָ֑ב <WH3577> lies לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> therefore הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> I am against נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> therefore behold I [am] against you saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְהָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> will have יָדִ֗י <WH3027> And mine hand אֶֽל־ <WH413> will be against הַנְּבִיאִ֞ים <WH5030> shall be upon the prophets הַחֹזִ֣ים <WH2374> that see שָׁוְא֮ <WH7723> vanity וְהַקֹּסְמִ֣ים <WH7080> and that divine כָּזָב֒ <WH3577> lies בְּס֧וֹד <WH5475> they shall not be in the assembly עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> of my people לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִהְי֗וּ <WH1961> place וּבִכְתָ֤ב <WH3791> in the writing בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִכָּתֵ֔בוּ <WH3789> neither shall they be written וְאֶל־ <WH413> will be against אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> into the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יָבֹ֑אוּ <WH935> neither shall they enter וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּ֥י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> GOD

יַ֣עַן <WH3282> is definitely וּבְיַ֜עַן <WH3282> because הִטְע֧וּ <WH2937> Because even because they have seduced אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֛י <WH5971> my people לֵאמֹ֥ר <WH559> saying שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> Peace וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> is no שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> and [there was] no peace וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> anyone בֹּ֣נֶה <WH1129> and one built up חַ֔יִץ <WH2434> a wall וְהִנָּ֛ם <WH2009> and lo טָחִ֥ים <WH2902> others daubed אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> תָּפֵֽל׃ <WH8602> it with untempered

אֱמֹ֛ר <WH559> Say אֶל־ <WH413> about טָחֵ֥י <WH2902> unto them which daub תָפֵ֖ל <WH8602> [it] with untempered וְיִפֹּ֑ל <WH5307> [morter] that it shall fall הָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> will come גֶּ֣שֶׁם <WH1653> shower שׁוֹטֵ֗ף <WH7857> there shall be an overflowing וְאַתֵּ֜נָה <WH859> and ye אַבְנֵ֤י <WH68> stones אֶלְגָּבִישׁ֙ <WH417> great hail תִּפֹּ֔לְנָה <WH5307> shall fall וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> wind סְעָר֖וֹת <WH5591> and a stormy תְּבַקֵּֽעַ׃ <WH1234> shall rend

וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> Behold נָפַ֣ל <WH5307> is fallen הַקִּ֑יר <WH7023> Lo when the wall הֲלוֹא֙ <WH3808> not יֵאָמֵ֣ר <WH559> shall it not be said אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> about אַיֵּ֥ה <WH346> Where הַטִּ֖יחַ <WH2915> unto you Where [is] the daubing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which טַחְתֶּֽם׃ <WH2902> wherewith ye have daubed ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD וּבִקַּעְתִּ֥י <WH1234> I will even rend רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> wind סְעָר֖וֹת <WH5591> [it] with a stormy בַּֽחֲמָתִ֑י <WH2534> in my fury וְגֶ֤שֶׁם <WH1653> shower שֹׁטֵף֙ <WH7857> and there shall be an overflowing בְּאַפִּ֣י <WH639> in mine anger יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become וְאַבְנֵ֥י <WH68> stones אֶלְגָּבִ֖ישׁ <WH417> great hail בְּחֵמָ֥ה <WH2534> in [my] fury לְכָלָֽה׃ <WH3617> to consume

וְהָ֨רַסְתִּ֜י <WH2040> So will I break down אֶת־ <WH853> הַקִּ֨יר <WH7023> the wall אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which טַחְתֶּ֥ם <WH2902> that ye have daubed תָּפֵ֛ל <WH8602> with untempered וְהִגַּעְתִּ֥יהוּ <WH5060> [morter] and bring אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> it down to the ground וְנִגְלָ֣ה <WH1540> thereof shall be discovered יְסֹד֑וֹ <WH3247> so that the foundation וְנָֽפְלָה֙ <WH5307> and it shall fall וּכְלִיתֶ֣ם <WH3615> and ye shall be consumed בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> in the midst וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> thereof and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

וְכִלֵּיתִ֤י <WH3615> Thus will I accomplish אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמָתִי֙ <WH2534> my wrath בַּקִּ֔יר <WH7023> upon the wall וּבַטָּחִ֥ים <WH2902> and upon them that have daubed אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> תָּפֵ֑ל <WH8602> it with untempered וְאֹמַ֤ר <WH559> [morter] and will say לָכֶם֙ אֵ֣ין <WH369> is gone הַקִּ֔יר <WH7023> unto you The wall וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> are gone הַטָּחִ֥ים <WH2902> [is] no [more] neither they that daubed אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

נְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> [To wit] the prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel הַֽנִבְּאִים֙ <WH5012> which prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> to יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> concerning Jerusalem וְהַחֹזִ֥ים <WH2374> and which see לָ֖הּ חֲז֣וֹן <WH2377> visions שָׁלֹ֑ם <WH7965> of peace וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> there שָׁלֹ֔ם <WH7965> for her and [there is] no peace נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> now you בֶן־ <WH1121> Likewise thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man שִׂ֤ים <WH7760> set פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> thy face אֶל־ <WH413> against בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> against the daughters עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> of thy people הַמִּֽתְנַבְּא֖וֹת <WH5012> which prophesy מִֽלִּבְּהֶ֑ן <WH3820> out of their own heart וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> and prophesy עֲלֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH5921> against

וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <WH559> And say כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD הוֹי֩ <WH1945> Woe לִֽמְתַפְּר֨וֹת <WH8609> to the [women] that sew כְּסָת֜וֹת <WH3704> pillows עַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַצִּילֵ֣י <WH679> joint יָדַ֗י <WH3027> able וְעֹשׂ֧וֹת <WH6213> and make הַמִּסְפָּח֛וֹת <WH4555> kerchiefs עַל־ <WH5921> for רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head כָּל־ <WH3605> every קוֹמָ֖ה <WH6967> of every stature לְצוֹדֵ֣ד <WH6679> to hunt נְפָשׁ֑וֹת <WH5315> souls הַנְּפָשׁוֹת֙ <WH5315> the souls תְּצוֹדֵ֣דְנָה <WH6679> Will ye hunt לְעַמִּ֔י <WH5971> of my people וּנְפָשׁ֖וֹת <WH5315> the souls לָכֶ֥נָה <WH2421> alive תְחַיֶּֽינָה׃ <WH2421> preserve

וַתְּחַלֶּלְ֨נָה <WH2490> And will ye pollute אֹתִ֜י <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to עַמִּ֗י <WH5971> me among my people בְּשַׁעֲלֵ֣י <WH8168> for handfuls שְׂעֹרִים֮ <WH8184> of barley וּבִפְת֣וֹתֵי <WH6595> and for pieces לֶחֶם֒ <WH3899> of bread לְהָמִ֤ית <WH4191> to slay נְפָשׁוֹת֙ <WH5315> the souls אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תְמוּתֶ֔נָה <WH4191> that should not die וּלְחַיּ֥וֹת <WH2421> alive נְפָשׁ֖וֹת <WH5315> the souls אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> not תִֽחְיֶ֑ינָה <WH2421> that should not live בְּכַ֨זֶּבְכֶ֔ם <WH3576> by your lying לְעַמִּ֖י <WH5971> to my people שֹׁמְעֵ֥י <WH8085> that hear כָזָֽב׃ <WH3577> deceitful ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Wherefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold אֶל־ <WH413> I am against כִּסְּתוֹתֵיכֶ֙נָה֙ <WH3704> Behold I [am] against your pillows אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אַ֠תֵּנָה <WH859> wherewith ye מְצֹדְד֨וֹת <WH6679> there hunt שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּפָשׁוֹת֙ <WH5315> the souls לְפֹ֣רְח֔וֹת <WH6524> to make [them] fly וְקָרַעְתִּ֣י <WH7167> and I will tear אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> from זְרוֹעֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH2220> them from your arms וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי֙ <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּפָשׁ֔וֹת <WH5315> and will let the souls אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you מְצֹדְד֥וֹת <WH6679> that ye hunt אֶת־ <WH853> נְפָשִׁ֖ים <WH5315> [even] the souls לְפֹרְחֹֽת׃ <WH6524> to make [them] fly

וְקָרַעְתִּ֞י <WH7167> also will I tear אֶת־ <WH853> מִסְפְּחֹֽתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH4555> Your kerchiefs וְהִצַּלְתִּ֤י <WH5337> and deliver אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> my people מִיֶּדְכֶ֔ן <WH3027> out of your hand וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will no יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become ע֛וֹד <WH5750> longer בְּיֶדְכֶ֖ן <WH3027> and they shall be no more in your hand לִמְצוּדָ֑ה <WH4686> to be hunted וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ן <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Because הַכְא֤וֹת <WH3512> sad לֵב־ <WH3820> ye have made the heart צַדִּיק֙ <WH6662> of the righteous שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> Because with lies וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not הִכְאַבְתִּ֑יו <WH3510> whom I have not made sad וּלְחַזֵּק֙ <WH2388> and strengthened יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> the hands רָשָׁ֔ע <WH7451> of the wicked לְבִלְתִּי־ <WH1115> not שׁ֛וּב <WH7725> that he should not return מִדַּרְכּ֥וֹ <WH1870> way הָרָ֖ע <WH7563> from his wicked לְהַחֲיֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH2421> by promising him life

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore שָׁ֚וְא <WH7723> no more vanity לֹ֣א <WH3808> will no תֶחֱזֶ֔ינָה <WH2372> Therefore ye shall see וְקֶ֖סֶם <WH7081> divinations לֹא־ <WH3808> will no תִקְסַ֣מְנָה <WH7080> nor divine ע֑וֹד <WH5750> longer וְהִצַּלְתִּ֤י <WH5337> for I will deliver אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> my people מִיֶּדְכֶ֔ן <WH3027> out of your hand וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ן <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD
